# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Standing Offer (RISO) for Placement and Repair of Asphalt Pavement

The Department of National Defence (DND), at 5 Canadian Forces Base Gagetown, New Brunswick, invites bids for the establishment of a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the placement and repair of asphalt pavement.

### Background and Purpose

The desired RISO will provide the necessary labour, materials, tools, and equipment for conducting asphalt pavement placement and repair services across various areas of 5 CDSB Gagetown, New Brunswick. The successful offeror will be required to meet the specific requirements stated in the bid document, including the use of the Specification Number L-G2-9302/180.

### Scope of Work

Work to be performed under the RISO includes:

* Placement and repair of asphalt pavement in designated areas of 5 CDSB Gagetown, New Brunswick
* Provision of labour, materials, tools, and equipment necessary to complete the work
* Compliance with the Specification Number L-G2-9302/180, as outlined in the bid document

### Standing Offer Period

The standing offer period will commence on April 1, 2024, and terminate on March 31, 2026. It is essential to note that there is no guarantee that the full or any portion of the RISO will be called upon, as this is a supply arrangement with government.

### Additional Information

Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Requests must be made to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days of receiving notification that their bid was unsuccessful. For further details, please consult the solicitation.

### Language and Documentation

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Winnipeg Supply and Services Centre invites bids from interested parties.

* Publication Date: January 24, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: February 15, 2024, at 2:00 PM NST
